task_summary: Perceive the pot lid, approach from top, grasp the knob gently, lift the lid upward, then retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator interacts with a small pot placed on a cube on a tabletop. The goal is to lift the lid off the pot. The robot must first ensure the lid is visible, localize it, compute a top-down grasp, and align above it. It opens the gripper, descends until contact, closes with low force on the lidâ€™s knob or handle, verifies grasp stability, lifts vertically to clear the pot, briefly stabilize, and retreat to a safe distance. Timing and forces are kept conservative to avoid knocking the pot.
preconditions: Pot lid is present on the pot
stepwise_plan: If lid not visible, scan in a short arc until it is.
Detect and localize the lid; compute a top grasp pose.
Move above the lid with a small vertical offset.
Open the gripper and descend slowly until contact.
Close gripper with low force and verify grasp stability.
Lift straight up, pause briefly, then retreat.
success_criteria: Lid is lifted clear of the pot rim
No tipping or collision with the pot
Stable grasp maintained during lift and retreat
failure_and_recovery: Lid not detected: rescan using arc pattern up to 3 attempts
Slipped grasp: reopen, re-approach, increase force by one bin if safe
Unexpected contact: stop descent, retreat small distance, retry approach
task_long_description.termination: End when the lid is held in the gripper above the pot and the arm has retreated to a safe standoff.

frame_4.now_evidence: End-effector descending near lid center; imminent contact.

frame_5.now_evidence: Gripper closed on knob; grasp event.

frame_6.now_evidence: End-effector higher than rim; lid separation evident.

task_instruction: lift up a lid from the pot

node_specs.description: Quick check if the lid is already visible.
Active scan to make the lid visible.
Compute top-down grasp over the lid knob.
Move to pre-grasp above the lid.
Prepare to descend over the knob.
Descend gently until contact with the lid.
Close on the knob with low force.
Ensure the grasp is secure before lifting.
Lift the lid vertically to clear the pot.
Brief stabilization pause while holding the lid.
Back off to a safe distance with the lid.

failure_modes: Lid not visible due to viewpoint
Collision with pot rim during lift
recovery_strategy: Recompute grasp pose and realign above center
Retry grasp with the next force bin if safe
Abort lift, raise slightly, and re-approach
assumptions: Frames show a metal pot with a removable lid on a cube; robot approaches from the right.
Lid has a small central knob suitable for a top grasp.
If frames differed from instruction, visual evidence would take precedence.

expected_success_criteria: Lid clearly separated from pot and held by gripper
No displacement of the pot beyond minor jitter
